item.title: 消息人士称，Permira 和 Warburg 接近以 82 亿美元收购 Clearwater Analytics
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，由 Permira 和华平投资集团牵头的私募股权投资公司已达成一项交易，将以约 82 亿美元（包括债务）收购投资和会计软件制造商 Clearwater Analytics Holdings。【原文：A group of private equity firms led by Permira and Warburg Pincus has clinched a deal to acquire investment and accounting software maker Clearwater Analytics Holdings for about $8.2 billion, including debt, two sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 瑞士内政部长对禁止儿童使用社交媒体持开放态度
item.description: 周日，瑞士内政部长伊丽莎白-鲍梅-施耐德（Elisabeth Baume-Schneider）被引述说，瑞士必须采取更多措施保护儿童免受社交媒体风险，这表明她对可能禁止青少年使用社交媒体平台持开放态度。【原文：Switzerland must do more to shield children from social media risks, Interior Minister Elisabeth Baume-Schneider was quoted as saying on Sunday, signalling she was open to a potential ban on the platforms for youngsters.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，美联储主席哈马克发出数月内保持利率稳定的信号
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周日报道，克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）表示，在央行过去三次降息会议之后，她认为数月内没有必要改变利率。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said she sees no need to change interest rates for months after the central bank cut rates at its last three meetings, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 食品储藏室排起长队通货膨胀考验特朗普在密歇根州的基础
item.description: 最近的一个大雪纷飞的早晨，在密歇根州一个喜欢特朗普的农村地区，三十几辆车停在一个消防队改建的食品储藏室外。在里面，志愿者们正在打包莴苣、苹果和其他家庭主食，这些食物今年的价格有的飙升，有的居高不下。【原文：On a recent snowy morning in a Trump-loving part of rural Michigan, three dozen cars idled outside a firehouse-turned-food pantry. Inside, volunteers packaged lettuce, apples and other household staples that have surged or stayed high in price this year.】

item.title: 韩国消费者机构将责令 SK 电讯赔偿 58 名黑客受害者
item.description: 韩国消费者机构周日表示，将责令 SK Telecom 向 58 名用户作出赔偿，这些用户因最近发生的黑客攻击事件而对该公司提起集体诉讼。【原文：South Korea's consumer agency said on Sunday it would order SK Telecom to compensate 58 users who filed a class action against the company over a recent hacking incident.】

item.title: 罗氏公司首席执行官指出，美国交易后瑞士未来药品价格将上涨
item.description: 周六援引瑞士制药巨头罗氏公司首席执行官的话说，制药公司与华盛顿达成的降低美国药品价格的协议很可能会推高瑞士新药的成本。【原文：Deals between pharmaceutical companies and Washington to reduce prices for medicines in the United States will likely push up the cost of new drugs in Switzerland, the CEO of Swiss pharma giant Roche was quoted as saying on Saturday.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克在法院就薪酬方案作出裁决后成为身价 7000 亿美元的第一人
item.description: 据福布斯亿万富豪指数显示，在特拉华州最高法院恢复去年作废的价值 1,390 亿美元的特斯拉股票期权后，特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克的净资产飙升至 7,490 亿美元。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk's net worth surged to $749 billion after the Delaware Supreme Court reinstated Tesla stock options worth $139 billion that were voided last year, according to Forbes' billionaires index.】

item.title: 解说员TikTok 的算法有什么特别之处？
item.description: 在线短视频平台 TikTok 的内容推荐算法再次成为人们关注的焦点，因为该应用的中国所有者字节跳动公司（ByteDance）签署了一项具有约束力的协议，将组建一家合资企业，把 TikTok 美国应用的运营控制权交给美国和全球投资者，其中包括云计算公司甲骨文公司（Oracle）。【原文：The content recommendation algorithm that powers the online short video platform TikTok has once again come under the spotlight after the app's Chinese owner ByteDance signed binding agreements to form a joint venture that will hand control of operations of TikTok's U.S. app to American and global investors, including cloud computing company Oracle .】

item.title: 商业内幕》称，由于使馆工作延误，谷歌警告持有美国签证的员工不要出国旅行
item.description: 据《商业内幕》（Business Insider）周五援引一封内部邮件报道，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司已建议一些持有美国签证的员工避免国际旅行，原因是大使馆的工作出现延误。【原文：Alphabet's Google has advised some employees on U.S. visas to avoid international travel due to delays at embassies, Business Insider reported on Friday, citing an internal email.】

item.title: 中国出台新规规范互联网平台定价
item.description: 中国网络空间管理局周六表示，将出台新规定，从 4 月 10 日起对互联网平台的定价进行监管。【原文：China's cyberspace authority said on Saturday it would introduce new regulations to regulate pricing on internet platforms effective from April 10.】

item.title: 7-Eleven Inc称首席执行官Jeo DePinto将退休
item.description: 便利连锁店 7-Eleven Inc 周五表示，首席执行官 Joe DePinto 将在任职 20 年后退休。【原文：Convenience store chain 7-Eleven Inc said on Friday that Chief Executive Officer Joe DePinto will retire after 20 years in the role.】

item.title: 美国食品和药物管理局向六种 on！尼古丁袋产品
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局周五表示，已通过旨在快速审查尼古丁袋产品的试点计划，授权销售 Altria 公司的六款尼古丁袋产品 on！PLUS尼古丁袋产品的销售，该试点计划旨在快速审查此类产品。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration said on Friday it has authorized the marketing of six Altria-owned on! PLUS nicotine pouch products, through a pilot program aimed to fast-track reviews of such products.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，软银力争在年底前履行对 OpenAI 的 225 亿美元融资承诺
item.description: 消息人士称，软银集团正通过一系列现金筹集计划（包括出售部分投资），争分夺秒地争取在年底前完成向 OpenAI 提供 225 亿美元资金的承诺，并可能动用以其在芯片公司 Arm Holdings 的宝贵所有权为抵押借款的未提取保证金贷款。【原文：SoftBank Group is racing to close a $22.5 billion funding commitment to OpenAI by year-end through an array of cash-raising schemes, including a sale of some investments, and could tap its undrawn margin loans borrowed against its valuable ownership in chip firm Arm Holdings , sources said.】

item.title: Meta 的迪娜-鲍威尔-麦考密克退出董事会，可能继续担任顾问
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司周五表示，迪娜-鲍威尔-麦考密克（Dina Powell McCormick）已辞去 Meta Platforms 董事会职务，辞职立即生效，这距离她加入董事会仅八个月。【原文：Dina Powell McCormick has resigned from Meta Platforms board of directors effective immediately, just eight months after joining, the company said on Friday.】

item.title: 波音为增售 35 架 777F 货机申请 FAA 排放豁免权
item.description: 波音公司周五以客户需求旺盛和下一代飞机认证延迟为由，要求美国联邦航空管理局豁免飞机排放规定，允许其再销售35架波音777F货机。【原文：Boeing on Friday asked the Federal Aviation Administration for a waiver of airplane emissions rules to allow it to sell another 35 Boeing 777F freighters, citing strong customer demand and a delay in the next-generation plane's certification.】

item.title: Aktis Oncology申请美国IPO，生物技术公司上市反弹
item.description: Aktis Oncology 公司周五提交了在美国首次公开募股的申请，生物技术行业的股票上市在经历放缓后出现反弹。【原文：Aktis Oncology filed for an initial public offering in the United States on Friday, as stock market listings from the biotech industry rebound after a slowdown.】

item.title: 白宫哈塞特告诉《福克斯商业》，特朗普对通货膨胀的看法是正确的，而其他人的看法是错误的
item.description: 白宫经济顾问凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）是美联储领导人的候选人之一，他周五在福克斯商业频道（Fox Business）的节目中说，唐纳德-特朗普总统说通胀率低是对的，尽管数据、公众舆论和大多数经济学家都与这一观点相左。【原文：White House economic advisor Kevin Hassett, who is on a shortlist to potentially become Federal Reserve leader, said on Fox Business Friday that President Donald Trump is right when he says inflation is low, even as the data, public opinion and most economists stand at odds with this view.】

item.title: 独家报道：桥水公司今年业绩大丰收，扩大员工持股范围
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份内部备忘录，对冲基金桥水联合公司（Bridgewater Associates）计划明年扩大员工持股计划，届时将有超过 60% 的员工拥有公司股权。【原文：Hedge fund Bridgewater Associates plans to expand its employee ownership initiative next year which will see more than 60% of staff own equity in the firm, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 马斯克上诉获胜，恢复 2018 年特斯拉薪酬协议，现值约 1550 亿美元
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）2018 年从特斯拉（Tesla）获得的薪酬福利曾经价值 560 亿美元，特拉华州最高法院周五恢复了他的薪酬福利，两年前，下级法院曾以 "深不可测 "为由驳回了这一薪酬协议。【原文：Elon Musk's 2018 pay package from Tesla , once worth $56 billion, was restored by the Delaware Supreme Court on Friday, two years after a lower court struck down the compensation deal as "unfathomable."】

item.title: 美敦力糖尿病业务公司MiniMed申请在美国上市
item.description: 美敦力公司旗下的 MiniMed 集团周五提交了在美国首次公开募股的申请，这家医疗设备制造商正在推进糖尿病业务的分拆。【原文：Medtronic's MiniMed Group filed for an initial public offering in the United States on Friday, as the medical device maker moves ahead with the spin-off of its diabetes business.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，美国银行投资银行家的奖金今年将大幅增长
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，美国银行将提高业绩最好的投资银行家的奖金，并在今年交易激增后增加该部门的奖金池。【原文：Bank of America will boost bonus payouts for its best performing investment bankers and increase its bonus pool for the division after a surge in deals this year, according to two sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 官员称美国农业机构不太可能发放更多农业援助
item.description: 美国农业部负责农业生产和保护的副部长理查德-福特斯（Richard Fordyce）表示，除了最近宣布的旨在帮助农民渡过经济困境的 120 亿美元一揽子计划之外，美国农业部不会考虑发放更多的农业援助。【原文：The U.S. Department of Agriculture is not considering issuing more farm aid beyond its recently announced $12 billion package meant to help farmers weather poor economic conditions, said Richard Fordyce, the agency's under secretary for farm production and conservation.】

item.title: 星巴克聘请亚马逊的 Anand Varadarajan 担任新任首席技术官
item.description: 星巴克周五表示，已任命阿南德-瓦拉达拉詹（Anand Varadarajan）为新任首席技术官，自 1 月 19 日起生效，首席执行官布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）正在推动门店的技术改革，以提高劳动效率。【原文：Starbucks said on Friday it has appointed Anand Varadarajan as its new chief technology officer, effective January 19, as CEO Brian Niccol pushes a tech revamp in stores to make labor more efficient.】

item.title: 庞巴迪Global 8000喷气机获得美国航空监管机构认证
item.description: 加拿大飞机制造商庞巴迪公司周五表示，自协和式飞机以来世界上速度最快的民用飞机--庞巴迪环球8000公务机已获得美国联邦航空管理局的认证。【原文：Bombardier's Global 8000 business jet, the world's fastest civilian plane since the Concorde, has received certification from the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration, the Canadian planemaker said on Friday.】

item.title: 欧盟理事会支持兼具在线和离线功能的数字欧元
item.description: 欧盟理事会周五支持数字欧元的谈判立场，该立场既包括在线功能，也包括离线功能，有别于欧洲议会早些时候提出的只关注离线使用的建议。【原文：The EU Council on Friday backed a negotiating position for a digital euro that includes both online and offline functionality, diverging from earlier European Parliament proposals that focused solely on offline usage.】

item.title: 报告称，人工智能热潮推动数据中心交易创历史新高
item.description: 截至今年 11 月，全球数据中心交易猛增，创下历史新高，其原因是对计算基础设施的巨大需求，以满足人工智能应用的蓬勃发展。【原文：Global data-center dealmaking surged to a record high through November this year, driven by an insatiable demand for computing infrastructure to meet the boom in artificial intelligence usage.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，人工智能芯片公司 Cerebras 将在推迟后申请在美国上市
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，人工智能芯片制造商 Cerebras Systems 正准备最快于下周提交美国首次公开募股申请，目标是在 2026 年第二季度上市。【原文：AI chip maker Cerebras Systems is preparing to file for a U.S. initial public offering as soon as next week, targeting a second-quarter 2026 listing, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国太空发展局耗资 35 亿美元订购 72 颗卫星
item.description: 美国太空部队下属的太空发展局周五表示，它已与四家国防供应商达成协议，将建造 72 颗卫星，总价值约 35 亿美元。【原文：The Space Development Agency, part of the U.S. Space Force, said on Friday it has reached agreements with four defense suppliers to build 72 satellites, worth about $3.5 billion collectively.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称摩根士丹利被视为 SpaceX IPO 的领跑者
item.description: 据三位熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根士丹利正在成为 SpaceX 首次公开募股的主要竞争者，因为该银行与首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）关系密切，在马斯克的决定中占有优势。【原文：Morgan Stanley is emerging as a leading contender for a key role in SpaceX's blockbuster initial public offering, as the bank's close ties to CEO Elon Musk give it an edge in his decision, according to three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 意大利以高达 5 亿欧元的价格向邮政和国家造币厂出售数字支付部门 PagoPA
item.description: 意大利财政部周五表示，已同意将处理公共行政数字支付的 PagoPA 公司出售给国家造币厂和国家支持的邮政集团意大利邮政（Poste Italiane），出售价格高达 5 亿欧元（5.86 亿美元）。【原文：Italy's Treasury has agreed to sell PagoPA, which handles digital payments to public administrations, to the state mint and to state-backed postal group Poste Italiane for up to 500 million euros ($586 million), the mint said on Friday.】
